parameters.name: codec
parameters.summary:
A codec implementation that generated deserializers will use for read operations. If
            no codec is provided, <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryCodec" /> will be used.

parameters.name: resolver
parameters.summary: A resolver to obtain type information from.
